content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani

content: Good afternoon, thank you for considering my property. I am looking for a fair rental price that will allow me to maximize my gains while also providing a comfortable living space for my tenant. Can you please provide a specific rental price that you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This is the best price I can offer. Is that enough for you?
name: Maria Mamani

content: Thank you for your offer. I understand that you are looking for a fair rental price that will allow you to make a profit while also providing a comfortable living space for your tenant. However, I am currently looking for a higher rental price. I would like to negotiate further to find a mutually beneficial agreement. Is there any room for negotiation on your part?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am afraid I cannot go any lower on the rental price. I am looking for a fair and reasonable price that will allow me to make a profit while also providing a comfortable living space for my tenant. Is there anything else we can discuss?
name: Maria Mamani

content: I understand your concern for profitability, but I am also looking for a fair and reasonable rental price that will allow me to provide a comfortable living space for my tenant. I am willing to negotiate further to find a mutually beneficial agreement. Would you be open to discussing additional terms or conditions that could help us reach an agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine
